Class DoctorUnavailableSlots

java.lang.Object
appointments.DoctorUnavailableSlots
public class DoctorUnavailableSlots extends Object
Represents an unavailable slot for a doctor on a specific date and time. This is used to manage and track the doctor's unavailable times.

    • fromCSV

      public static DoctorUnavailableSlots fromCSV(String csvString)
      Parses a CSV string to create a DoctorUnavailableSlots object.
      Parameters:
      csvString - the CSV string in the format "doctorId|date|time" where date is in ISO format (yyyy-MM-dd) and time is in ISO format (HH:mm)
      Returns:
      a new DoctorUnavailableSlots object
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the CSV string is not in the correct format
